# Weak

ore borax
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/borax

ore cinnabar oreCinnabar
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/cinnabar

ore galena oreLead
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/galena

# This was referred to oreMolydenum in the original PFAA COG XML
ore molybdenite oreMolybdenum
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/molybdenite

ore pyrolusite oreManganese
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/pyrolusite

type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/salt

hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/stibnite

type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/chrysotile

type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/salitre

type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/realgar

hardness 2.0

type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/gypsum

type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/mirabilite

ore mica
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/mica
textureCaps strata:blocks/ore/weak/mica_caps

ore soapstone
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/soapstone

ore trona
type stone
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/trona
textureCaps strata:blocks/ore/weak/trona_caps

ore bog_iron oreIron
type stone
hardness 2.0
vanillaItem minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/weak/bog_iron

# Medium

type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/barite

type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/bastnasite

# PFAA COG XML mentions malachite but cannot be found

type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/chalcopyrite

type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/garnierite

hardness 3.0

hardness 3.0

hardness 3.0

texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/wolframite

# Regardless of IUPAC naming, oreBauxite came first

type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/alunite

hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/celestine

hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/dolomite

hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/fluorite

hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/wollastonite

type stone
hardness 3.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/medium/zeolite

type stone
hardness 4.0

textureCaps strata:blocks/ore/strong/banded_iron_caps

type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/quartz

type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/cassiterite

type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/chromite

type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/ilmenite

ore magnetite oreIron
type stone
hardness 4.0
vanillaItem minecraft:iron_ore
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/magnetite

# Caesium is the IUPAC name. Beware of oreCesium
ore pollucite oreCaesium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pollucite

ore spodumene oreLithium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/spodumene

ore tantalite oreTantalum
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/tantalite

ore pitchblende oreUranium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pitchblende

ore vanadium_magnetite oreVanadium
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/vanadium_magnetite

# orePhosphate or orePhosphorus? PFAA COG XML uses oreApatite
ore apatite oreApatite
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/apatite

ore kyanite
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/kyanite

type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/perlite
textureCaps strata:blocks/ore/strong/perlite_caps

ore pumice
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pumice

ore pyrite
type stone
hardness 4.0
texture strata:blocks/ore/strong/pyrite
